Simply put, the #CBCBudget is a better reflection of our nation’s goals and priorities.
The #CBCBudget reflects the needs of the middle class and works hard to help lift millions of families out of poverty.
The #CBCBudget makes the tax code more fair & reduces the deficit by $2.5 trillion.pic.twitter.com/6s1O3AHkKI
The #CBCBudget protects programs critical to our seniors and enhances Social Security benefits.
The #CBCBudget increases the Pell Grant by $1000 making college more affordable.
The #CBCBudget creates 2 million more jobs over the next decade.pic.twitter.com/i8QJQKjFdZ
The #CBCBudget invests $300 billion over the next decade to eradicate poverty & provide a basic standard of living for hardworking Americans

What do you get with the #CBCBudget? 

-Comprehensive jobs programs 
-Increased economic opportunities 
-Investments in education
As the Chief Architect of the #CBCBudget,working families deserve to have an honest & straightforward budget that invests in our communities
The @OfficialCBC is again offering an alternative budget to the #GOPBudget.
The #GOPBudget highlights the wrong priorities and leaves working families out in the cold.
The #GOPBudget needs a #RealityCheck. America’s budget shouldn’t help the wealthy at the expense of working families.
The #GOPBudget claims unrealistic growth will pay for massive tax cuts. But in reality, @HouseGOP are planning to gut the social safety net.
Our budget should reflect our priorities. The #GOPBudget will only weaken the American economy.
